scripts.test: echo 'Waiting 10 seconds before continuing...' && sleep 10 && mocha --exit --timeout 10000 --retries 2 --recursive tests
scripts.lint: eslint --format codeframe httpserv/server_httpserv.js imed/server_imed.js obse/server_obse.js orig/server_orig.js
scripts.lint-html: eslint --format node_modules/eslint-html-reporter/reporter.js -o tests/lint-report.html httpserv/server_httpserv.js imed/server_imed.js obse/server_obse.js orig/server_orig.js
